newsitem.title: RUSSIA: YELTSIN ARRIVES IN KREMLIN, MAY MEET PREMIER-RIA.
newsitem.headline: YELTSIN ARRIVES IN KREMLIN, MAY MEET PREMIER-RIA.

text.p: Russian President Boris Yeltsin arrived in the Kremlin on Tuesday and may meet Prime Minister Viktor Chernomyrdin, RIA news agency said.

Yeltsin, 65, has been recovering from pneumonia in a government guest house outside Moscow. Aides said he visited the Kremlin last week, his first trip there since he was taken ill with pneumonia on January 6. The president has not appeared on television since then.
